scripts.package:lambda: powershell -NoLogo -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType Directory dist | Out-Null; Copy-Item lambda.js dist/; if (Test-Path node_modules) { Copy-Item -Recurse node_modules dist/ } ; Compress-Archive -Path dist/* -DestinationPath dist/lambda.zip -Force"
